bookAuthors: Rita Mae Brown, Sneaky Pie Brown
Plot: Small towns don't take kindly to strangers - unless the stranger happens to be drop-dead gorgeous. When Blair Bainbridge comes to Virginia, the local matchmakers lose no time in declaring him perfect for their divorced postmistress, Marry Minor. However, when a corpse is uncovered, he also becomes a likely suspect.
Characters: Harry Haristeen, Tee Tucker, Mrs. Murphy
